name: Mass Exodus
description: Whether youâ€™re playing the seeker (VR) or rogue android (PC), Mass Exodus is a tense and absorbing local multiplayer game. With 3 extensive maps and some creative power-ups, you need to try outsmart your friends anyway you can. Oculus Touch and HTC Vive compatible.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 equivalent or greater. Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i7-4790 equivalent or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1070 equivalent or greater. Storage: 6 GB available space
